name: Engage & Grow Global
description: Engage & Grow is now becoming the number one employee engagement company in the world. Their proven methods have disrupted the L&D and HR industries across the globe with their bold statement: Traditional Training is Dead. Now represented in over 80 countries, with over 220 certified coaches worldwide, they are well and truly on their way to delivering on their mission to create a 'Globally Engaged Workforce’.
features: Tracking & reporting over the 12-week period creating a highly transparent & accountable environment
The strategic development of new habits and behaviors, whilst captivating and entertaining in its delivery
12 'Engagement Keys'​ that are aligned and customized for every business and employee
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Reduce the Cost of Hiring Qualified Employees
Headline: Employee Happiness | Productivity | Engagement
ShortDescription: Our practice at Engage & Grow began on the sports field. Our founder was a failed elite athlete. As any good entrepreneur does, he began searching for the reasons he failed as an elite athlete so to learn from his mistakes.
enhanced_description: Engage & Grow Global positions itself as a leading employee engagement company, challenging traditional L&D and HR methods with its 'Traditional Training is Dead' philosophy. Originating from a performance-driven background focused on learning from mistakes and fostering growth, their mission is to create a 'Globally Engaged Workforce'. The company operates in over 80 countries with more than 220 certified coaches worldwide. They deliver structured 12-week programs designed for the strategic development of new habits and behaviors, delivered in a captivating and entertaining manner. A core component of their offering includes 12 customizable 'Engagement Keys' aligned with specific business and employee needs. These programs emphasize a highly transparent and accountable environment through integrated tracking and reporting over the 12-week period.
key_use_cases: Fostering strategic development of new habits and behaviors
Enhancing organizational accountability through transparent tracking
Optimizing the hiring process to attract top talent
Increasing hiring manager confidence and efficiency
Reducing the cost of hiring qualified employees
competitive_advantages: Proven methods that disrupt traditional L&D and HR industries
Global presence with operations in over 80 countries and 220+ certified coaches
Structured 12-week program with integrated tracking and reporting for transparency and accountability
Customizable '12 Engagement Keys' aligned to specific business and employee needs
Focus on strategic habit and behavior development
implementation_scenarios: 12-week structured programs delivered with certified coaches
roi_benefits: Enhanced transparency and accountability within the workforce
Development of new, beneficial habits and behaviors
Faster and more efficient hiring of top talent
Boosted hiring manager confidence and productivity
Reduced costs associated with hiring qualified employees
scalability_features: Global presence with operations in over 80 countries
Network of over 220 certified coaches worldwide
Mission to create a 'Globally Engaged Workforce'
